chara.textHome:
Greetings! I am Kanoko Yayoi!
I have a dream career, you know.
I want to be...a fashion designer!

I want my clothes to be displayed
at Paris Fashion Week, and...hm?
Oh come on! You gotta set your sights high!

We have no way of knowing
what the world has planned!
I even became a Magical Girl, after all!

Look at the clothes I designed!
My masterpiece!
What do you think?
Oh, you can't see it?

Well, only those who are pure
of heart can witness it!

You have to cast out
all your wicked thoughts!
How's this, now!
My talent is rocketing sky-high!
It knows no bounds!

The images are forming clear
and bright in my mind!
I guess this is my awakening!
My mental prowess right now...

If I were to describe it,
maybe it's like a light bulb switching on?
That's clich√©, though.
I guess that means I'm the same as ever.
C'mon, I need more inspiration!
Oh yes, here we go!

My brain is lit up like a chandelier,
the light is whirling like a disco ball in motion,
and I'm dancing inside my own head!

I could bang out a thousand
design ideas right now!

Oh, you're here.
Heyyy, nice outfit!
You look great!

It's important to have time to get ready 
in the morning, so I like to wake up early.
I mean, I want to at least...
That's why my hair is all messy!
I've got the same bento for lunch as my dad.
Mom made them for us.

I'm so grateful for her.
Thank you so much, Mom!

I know!
I'm gonna stop by that store
on my way home!
They had some shoes I really liked...

I can't afford them, but
I can at least look at them!

Oh!
I was busy designing clothes 
and now look what time it is!
Oh no, I haven't done my homework yet...
It's already late...
Guess I'll just go to sleep!
I always have a pen and paper on me.

I wanna be able to draw any designs the
moment an idea hits me!
Huh? This paper?
Oh, it's just the back of a flyer I got!
I can't give up on my dreams.
This is my only chance at life, so
I've gotta give it everything I have!

Now's when you gotta just let
momentum carry you through!
You just gotta psych yourself up!
Never underestimate us factory girls!

I can't help but fall in love with 
all the cute clothes I see in town!
It really is like I'm in love.

I guess I'm just a girl who
has a lotta love to give!
Look, I designed this!
It's a brand new type of animal print.

I call it...the Lilac-Breasted Roller print!
It's so beautiful...
Huh? You don't think so?
If I say, "pink clothes," it sounds cute, right?
But if I say, "salmon pink clothes,"
that just sounds weird and fishy, doesn't it?
Oh my gosh, your clothes are so cute!

Where did you buy then?!
Tell me, tell me, tell me!...
I only ask because I'm trying to learn!
Sometimes, there's just nothing you can do.

But when there's nothing you can do,
I like to try and think of a solution anyway!
My dad makes really tiny machine parts.
He's really good at it too!

He said they use his parts
in rockets and stuff!

I don't really get much of a reaction
when I show people my designs...
But it's okay.

I'm sure they're just overcome
with emotion and can't speak!
I have everything perfectly planned!
Now I just need to keep moving forward,

and one day my runway dream
is bound to come true!
What do I wear at home?
Uh, sweats. Heyyy, don't give me that face!

I just wanna relax!
Sweatpants and stuff are great!
When it's cold, I wear a sweater.
I'm gonna rock this!
I can't give up. Not now, not here!
As I calculated, we won!
Stylish win!
My victory is a sure bet!

Allow me, Kanoko Yayoi,
to take care of your wardrobe for you!

Today I will dress you head
to toe in mulberry mauve!
You'll look SO cool!

Oh? Did I just become more
sophisticated right now?

What do you think?
Aren't I positively sparkling?
Dress-up time!
Yes, yes! We can go further than this!
There! Finished!

What do you think of this piece?
 I conceptualized it as winter clothes
befitting the biting cold...
No, they're NOT just torn and faded rags!
Here, look at my design sketch!

Long sleeve on one side,
short sleeve on the other.

It's made from a mix of thin and thick fabric
so you can wear it all year round!
I call it "Four Season Fashion"!
